## Getting to know Shuyang Lin

## Hometown
He is from Shantou, Guangdong, China.

## Journey on Data Science
He graduated from Fudan University. He studied Information Systems. He was fascinated by the power of utilizing data to solve problems and determined to pursue data science as a career path.

## Favorite Food
His favorite food is Hot Pot and during breaks, he would eat Hot Pot once a week.
## Hobbies
His hobby is Archery which he started during freshman year. He won a bronze medal in 2019's National Univerity Championship.

## Favorite books/movies/artists
His favorite book is 'Three-Body Problem', favorite movies is 'The Lord of the Ring', and Miyazaki, a game developer, is his favorite artist.
